snippet.title: Title: A New 100-GHz Band Two-Beam Sideband-Separating SIS Receiver for Z-Machine on the NRO 45-m Radio Telescope
snippet.description:
Title: A New 100-GHz Band Two-Beam Sideband-Separating SIS Receiver for Z-Machine on the NRO 45-m Radio Telescope
Authors: Taku Nakajima, Kimihiro Kimura, Atsushi Nishimura, Hiroyuki Iwashita, Chieko Miyazawa, Takeshi Sakai, Daisuke Iono, Kotaro Kohno, Ryohei Kawabe, Nario Kuno, Hideo Ogawa, Shin'ichiro Asayama, Tomonori Tamura, Takashi Noguchi
Comments: 15 pages, 14 figures, accepted for publication in PASP
Subjects: Instrumentation and Methods for Astrophysics (astro-ph.IM)

snippet.title: Title: Z-machine science other than CO - scientific and technical prospects for very wide band-width radio and (sub)millimeter-wavelength spectroscopy
snippet.description:
Title: Z-machine science other than CO - scientific and technical prospects for very wide band-width radio and (sub)millimeter-wavelength spectroscopy
Authors: Karl M. Menten (MPIfR)
Comments: 10 pages, incl. 2 figures. To appear in From Z-Machines to ALMA: (Sub)millimeter Spectroscopy of Galaxies, ASP Conference Series, eds. A. J. Baker, J. Glenn, A. I. Harris, J. G. Mangum, M. S. Yun
Subjects: Astrophysics (astro-ph)
